languages.text: "Что касается Врат Паутины, о которых упоминал Аребенниан... для того, чтобы они распахнули свои створки и впустили нас в лабиринт, тебе понадобится помощь одного из нашего рода". {n}На лбу Ирлиэт возникает складка.{/n} "Я... могла бы попытаться открыть Врата. Но для этого мне понадобится особый конструкт — резонанс-устройство. Хозяева этого места наверняка хранят его под рукой".

traits.locale_text: "Что касается Врат Паутины, о которых упоминал Аребенниан... для того, чтобы они распахнули свои створки и впустили нас в лабиринт, тебе понадобится помощь одного из нашего рода". {n}На лбу Ирлиэт возникает складка.{/n} "Я... могла бы попытаться открыть Врата. Но для этого мне понадобится особый конструкт — психосиловой ключ. Хозяева этого места наверняка хранят его под рукой".

languages.text: "As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."
languages.original_text: "Что касается Врат Паутины, о которых упоминал Аребенниан... для того, чтобы они распахнули свои створки и впустили нас в лабиринт, тебе понадобится помощь одного из нашего рода". {n}На лбу Ирлиэт возникает складка.{/n} "Я... могла бы попытаться открыть Врата. Но для этого мне понадобится особый конструкт — резонанс-устройство. Хозяева этого места наверняка хранят его под рукой".

traits.locale_text: "As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct — a psy-active key. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

"As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct — a psy-active key. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a psy-active key. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

"As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a psy-active key. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

"As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

"As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

languages.text: « Quant au portail sur la Toile dont parlait l'Arebennian... vous aurez besoin de l'aide de l'un des nôtres pour l'ouvrir et pénétrer dans la Toile. » {n}Yrliet fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Je pourrais... essayer d'ouvrir le portail. Mais j'aurais besoin d'un objet particulier : un appareil de résonance. Les maîtres des lieux doivent le garder précieusement. »
languages.original_text: "As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

traits.locale_text: « Quant au portail de la Toile dont parlait l'arebennian... vous aurez besoin de l'aide de l'un des nôtres pour l'ouvrir et pénétrer dans la Toile. » {n}Yrliet fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Je pourrais... essayer d'ouvrir le portail. Mais j'aurais besoin d'un objet particulier : une clé psy-active. Les maîtres des lieux doivent la garder précieusement. »

languages.text: “至于那个独角提到的网道门……你需要我们的帮助，才能打开大门，进入网道。”{n}伊莉耶特眉头紧锁。{/n}“我可以……试着打开那扇门，但若要打开大门，我需要一件特别的造物——一台共鸣装置。这样的装置肯定藏在这座尖塔的主人身边。”
languages.original_text: "As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

traits.locale_text: “至于那个独角提到的网道门……你需要我们的帮助，才能打开大门，进入网道。”{n}伊莉耶特眉头紧锁。{/n}“我可以……试着打开那扇门，但若要打开大门，我需要一把特别的灵能钥匙。这样的钥匙肯定藏在这座尖塔的主人身边。”

languages.text: 「アーベニアンが言っていた網辻門だが…あなたが網辻に入るには、我々の同胞の助けが必要だ」{n}ユリエットは眉をひそめた。{/n}「我は…門を開けることができると思う。だがそのためには共鳴装置が必要になる。ここの主人たちは、それを手近に置いているはずだ」
languages.original_text: "As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

traits.locale_text: 「アーベニアンが言っていた網辻門だが…あなたが網辻に入るには、我々の同胞の助けが必要だ」{n}ユリエットは眉をひそめた。{/n}「我は…門を開けることができると思う。だがそのためには共鳴装置が必要になる。ここの主人たちは、それを手近に置いているはずだ」

languages.text: "Was das Netzportal betrifft, das der Arebennian erwähnte ... Ihr werdet die Hilfe meines Volks benötigen, damit es sich für Euch öffnet und Ihr das Netz der Tausend Tore betreten könnt." {n}Yrliet runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich könnte es versuchen ... das Portal zu öffnen. Aber dafür bräuchte ich ein ganz bestimmtes Konstrukt – ein Resonanzgerät. Die Meister dieses Orts haben sicher einen in der Nähe verwahrt."
languages.original_text: "As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

traits.locale_text: "Was das Netzportal betrifft, das der Arebennian erwähnte ... Ihr werdet die Hilfe meines Volks benötigen, damit es sich für Euch öffnet und Ihr das Netz der Tausend Tore betreten könnt." {n}Yrliet runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich könnte es versuchen ... das Portal zu öffnen. Aber dafür bräuchte ich ein ganz bestimmtes Konstrukt – einen psi-aktiven Schlüssel. Die Meister dieses Orts haben sicher einen in der Nähe verwahrt."

languages.text: «En cuanto al portal de la Telaraña que mencionó el Arebennian... Para abrirlo y entrar en la Telaraña se requiere la ayuda de alguien de mi especie». {n}Yrliet frunce el ceño.{/n} «Yo podría... intentar abrir el portal. Pero para ello necesitaré cierto artilugio: un dispositivo de resonancia. Los señores de este lugar deben guardar alguno a mano».
languages.original_text: "As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto al portal de la Telaraña que mencionó el Arebennian... Para abrirlo y entrar en la Telaraña se requiere la ayuda de alguien de mi especie». {n}Yrliet frunce el ceño.{/n} «Yo podría... intentar abrir el portal. Pero para ello necesitaré cierto artilugio: una llave psicoactiva. Los señores de este lugar deben guardar alguna a mano».

languages.text: "Arebannian'ın sözünü ettiği Ağyol Geçidi konusundaysa... Açılabilmesi ve seni Ağyol'a sokabilmesi için türümüzden birinin yardımına ihtiyacın olacaktır." {n}Yrliet'in kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Geçit'i ben açmayı deneyebilirim ama bunu yapabilmek için belli bir yapıya, bir yankılaşım cihazına ihtiyacım var. Bu yerin efendilerinin elinde mutlaka olmalı."
languages.original_text: "As for the Webway Gate that the Arebennian mentioned... For it to open before you and let you enter the Webway, you would require help from one of our kind." {n}Yrliet's brow furrows.{/n} "I could... try to open the Gate. But to do that, I would need a certain construct: a resonance device. The masters of this place must keep it close at hand."

traits.locale_text: "Arebannian'ın sözünü ettiği Ağyol Geçidi konusundaysa... Açılabilmesi ve seni Ağyol'a sokabilmesi için türümüzden birinin yardımına ihtiyacın olacaktır." {n}Yrliet'in kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Geçit'i ben açmayı deneyebilirim ama bunu yapabilmek için belli bir yapıya, bir yankılaşım cihazına ihtiyacım var. Bu yerin efendilerinin elinde mutlaka olmalı."
